mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.category_id, g.name, g.brand_id, g.sell_point, g.deleted, g.create_time, g.update_time, b.name brand_name, c.name category_name FROM greenorange.tb_goods g LEFT JOIN tb_brand b ON g.brand_id = b.id LEFT JOIN tb_category c ON g.category_id = c.id where g.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into greenorange.tb_goods(category_id, name, brand_id, sell_point, deleted, create_time, update_time) values (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{brandId}, #{sellPoint}, #{deleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update greenorange.tb_goods
category_id = #{categoryId},
name = #{name},
brand_id = #{brandId},
sell_point = #{sellPoint},
deleted = #{deleted},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
